description.name: Smoky
description.text: data/turrets/smoky/m0/preview.png;Medium caliber tank gun, which is used in light and training tanks. The key to its popularity is low price and ease of maintenance. Put it on a light hull and use wearing-out strategy against heavy clumsy tanks of your opponents. Several upgrades can significantly increase the damage dealt by this baby. Remember that Smoky's effectiveness decreases with distance.

description.name: Firebird
description.text: data/turrets/flamethrower/m0/preview.png;When battles take place in close quarters, there is no better weapon than the firebird. This is a weapon of mass annihilation which can and will melt down any tank and its crew in no time. It is highly effective in confined spaces against slow moving tanks. Firebird is relatively slow when it comes to recharging but you can also shoot with a partially recharged gun.

description.name: Twins
description.text: data/turrets/twins/m0/preview.png;This rapid firing two barreled plasma gun will melt enemy in seconds. Taking into account the fact that by hitting other tanks with Twins, you knock off their aim, the weapon is ideal when it comes to dynamic firefight at medium distances.

description.name: Railgun
description.text: data/turrets/railgun/m0/preview.png;If mid caliber guns are not enough for your self expression, this weapon is right for you. Large caliber gun with huge muzzle speed and shells using depleted uranium. Extremely powerful and accurate kinetic projectile can go right through the enemy's tank or hit several targets standing on the line of fire with a single shot. An ideal choice for long range trench warfare and sniping. Remember that it takes a lot of time to recharge the gun and make sure your opponents will not take advantage of it.

description.name: Isida
description.text: data/turrets/isida/m0/preview.png;The idea of this unique weapon arose in the times of the cold war but was brought to life only with the development of quantum physics and nanotechnologies. The heart of this wonder machine is generator of nanorobots able to reproduce or destroy the structure of any non biological material. The weapon is equipped with impulse emitter which allows transporting nanomass in the magnetic channel at a distance of about twenty meters. Molecular material, derived when nanorobots are functioning in the mode of target destruction, is used to fix shooter's own chassis. Thus, isida deals damage to enemies and heals allies, which makes it invaluable in team battles.

description.name: Thunder
description.text: data/turrets/thunder/m0/preview.png;This second generation middle caliber gun is the best choice for dynamic battle. Quick recharge will give you a distinct advantage over heavy tanks of enemy. Equipped with light armor, Thunder is one of the most dangerous weapons on the battlefield.

description.name: Freeze
description.text: data/turrets/freeze/m0/preview.png;The idea of Freeze weapon system was born in a desolate Russian village. Using an old broken refrigerator (Sever) and avancuum cleaner (Buran) local inventor made the (Freeze Thrower). A professional engineer who had been fishing near the village noticed this invention and brought it to the Zhukov Research Institute. There the clumsy (Freeze Thrower) became the formidable Freeze gun. It showers enemy with the chemical composition based on freon. Victims take damage and all their movements and processes become slower.

description.name: Ricochet
description.text: data/turrets/ricochet/m0/preview.png;Ricochet plasma gun is a new secret project of Siberian scientists. To produce this gun team of 22 high class professionals have been working in the underground bunker more than three years without permission to exit on the surface. And they have created a unique weapon. It throws plasma charges cloaked with clever minus field. When such charge hits the tank it explodes. So with Ricochet you can heat targets out of your visibility range.

description.name: Shaft
description.text: data/turrets/shaft/m0/preview.png;The Shaft gun was designed by scientists who gave its enormous possibilities. It can make coffee, deliver pizzas, pay billz. Get a unique opportunity to fight at long and short distances.

description.name: Isida Prototype
description.text: data/turrets/terminator/m3/preview.png;This is a prototype of the legendary nanorobot weapon, and was the first model of the Isida weapon. Isida Prototype was firstly available on the test servers much years ago, and was replaced with newest models.

description.name: Snowman
description.text: data/turrets/vulkan/m0/preview.png;Do you love snow? Because we do :)

description.name: Ricochet Prototype
description.text: data/turrets/striker/m0/preview.png;This is a prototype of the legendary plasma weapon, and was the first model of the Ricochet weapon. Ricochet Prototype was firstly available on the test servers much years ago, and was replaced with newest models.

description.name: Pumkin
description.text: data/turrets/gauss/m0/preview.png;The most scary weapon in this game. Isn't it?

description.name: Smoky XT
description.text: data/turrets/gauss/prime/preview.png;A special version of the classic Smoky gun, Smoky XT posseses greater power than any standard modification, including the M3.

description.name: Railgun Prototype
description.text: data/turrets/railgun/prime/preview.png;One of the most beloved turrets in the game gets a cool retro look with its very own Prototype skin. A throwback to what this deadly turret looked like before the rebalance.

description.name: Hunter
description.text: data/hulls/hunter/m0/preview.png;Hunter is the most versatile hull in the game. Thanks to balance between reinforced steel armor plates and low energy consumption this armor is an all purpose one. It is good for everybody, and you'll never stay without a job on a field of war.

description.name: Wasp
description.text: data/hulls/wasp/m0/preview.png;Lightweight, economical, easy to operate - Wasp is a perfect hull for beginners. Upgraded wasp can reach fairly high speed, which in combination with small size gives the freedom of action on the battlefield.

description.name: Titan
description.text: data/hulls/titan/m0/preview.png;Titan alloy armor plates combined with special geometry make this hull highly effective even against large caliber weapons. With Titan, you can plunge into the thick of a battle without any hesitation. Please note that due to low speed this hull is not suitable for fast attacks behind enemy lines.

description.name: Dictator
description.text: data/hulls/dictator/m0/preview.png;Because of improved active defense system and usage of newest composite materials, this armor effectively absorbs energy of an impact of almost any caliber gun. With Dictator you can fight on the front line of any battle. Being one of the fastest and best protected hulls in the game, Dictator is large which makes it an easy target.

description.name: Hornet
description.text: data/hulls/horn/m0/preview.png;This compact hull uses the latest generation of composite materials, which makes it light, quick and grants high survivability even after a direct hit. Hornet is perfect for quick battles.

description.name: Viking
description.text: data/hulls/vik/m0/preview.png;This armor incorporates all modern military technologies. Reinforced armor and (Type 2) engine make Viking one of the most versatile hulls. Attack the enemy or cover your teammates - this hull will prove itself as a good and trustful one in any situation.

description.name: Mammoth
description.text: data/hulls/mamont/m0/preview.png;This is not a tank - this is a fortress on tracks. Mammoth is the flagship among other hulls. Extremely heavy, strengthened with super-conrete this hull is slow, which does not prevent Mammoth from successfully fighting against several enemy tanks.

description.name: Hornet Prototype
description.text: data/hulls/jugger/m0/preview.png;The legendary Hornet hull gets a blast from the past with a brand new prototype skin for a touch of nostalgia.

description.name: UFO
description.text: data/hulls/ares/m0/preview.png;UFO - The first levitating body in the game, invented by the creators of TankiOnline and it was never added to the game!

description.name: Tester
description.text: data/colormaps/tester/preview.png;Mechanic Coating is based on principles developed by Nikola Tesla himself. Metal wrenches placed on carbon plates along a special grid of coordinates, under the influence of current, create a magnetic resonance field with properties not fully understood. The coating is installed on special test tanks, the pilots of which voluntarily participate in experiments, risking their lives for the benefit of future generations. The paint protects against: smokey - 25%. Twins - 25%. Flamethrower - 25%

description.name: Green
description.text: data/colormaps/green/preview.png;More like a tribute to the traditions of classic tank building, this uncomplicated color, so beloved by designers around the world, has become a kind of standard for factory models. This legendary color is often returned true connoisseurs, having tried everything in the world.

description.name: Ukraine
description.text: data/colormaps/ukraine/preview.png;This paint has been added as a support to all Ukrainian people who are now fighting against Russian occupants. Слава Україні!

description.name: Red
description.text: data/colormaps/red/preview.png;Red is the color of rage and courage, and also has a natural practicality, allowing you to delicately hide enemy blood stains that inevitably appear on the hull, no matter how careful you are .

description.name: Blue
description.text: data/colormaps/blue/preview.png;This coloration was kept on the official list as a memory of the failed Som amphibious tank project. As conceived by the designers, he was supposed to move along the beds of shallow rivers, and, thanks to the blue color, freely penetrate into the deep enemy rear, remaining unnoticed.

description.name: Black
description.text: data/colormaps/black/preview.png;This coloring has become the unspoken standard for sabotage tank divisions whose main task is to covertly penetrate enemy territory at night. In army circles, tanks from such elite divisions are enviously called black spots of death behind their backs.

description.name: White
description.text: data/colormaps/white/preview.png;Specially designed for ground operations in cold countries. In snowy areas, this coloring can significantly reduce the likelihood of detection. In order to increase sales, the manufacturer included a warm sheepskin coat and felt boots are included.

description.name: Orange
description.text: data/colormaps/orange/preview.png;This colormap was not intended to be included in the official list, as it was of little practical value other than perhaps mediocre camouflage in the desert. But army shrinks have proven that orange has a positive effect on the psychological health of cannon fodder.

description.name: Flora
description.text: data/colormaps/flora/preview.png;This is one of two paints specifically designed for ground operations in a mid-latitude climate. According to reports from the independent organization `True Camouflage`, a tank wearing this particular combination of yellow, green and brown, are less likely to be detected in such regions.

description.name: Marine
description.text: data/colormaps/m/preview.png;Special skin for battles near water.

description.name: Swamp
description.text: data/colormaps/bol/preview.png;The leader of the tank battalion, who accidentally fell asleep, led his comrades into a swamp, where a covert operation was being carried out to train saboteur toads, and about ten thousand copies turned into a prototype of this coloring.

description.name: Forest
description.text: data/colormaps/wood/preview.png;This is one of two paints specifically designed for ground operations in a mid-latitude climate. According to reports from the independent organization `True Camouflage`, a tank wearing this particular combination of light and dark green, is less likely to be detected in such regions.

description.name: Metallic
description.text: data/colormaps/metallic/preview.png;There is an erroneous opinion that this coloring is used in conditions of shortage of paints and varnishes. In fact, this is a special coating that reflects light in a special way. Glare noise, created by such a coating interferes with the operation of some guidance systems.

description.name: Lava
description.text: data/colormaps/lava/preview.png;An experimental color first tested during local conflicts in East Africa. According to army psychologists, this coloring is capable of shocking representatives of some radical religious organizations, causing they have a panicky fear of inferno.

description.name: Lead
description.text: data/colormaps/sv/preview.png;Lead is the most reliable protection against radiation, it was known back in the twentieth century. Lead-coated armor effectively protects the tanker's reproductive system from radiation, allowing you to stay alert spirit even in the most hot alterations!

description.name: Safari
description.text: data/colormaps/safar/preview.png;Very stylish colormap for mods. Rare.

description.name: Dragon
description.text: data/colormaps/drak/preview.png;This intricate composite skin is based on dragon scales, each scale hand-painted onto titanium-reinforced armor.

description.name: Mary
description.text: data/colormaps/me/preview.png;Stained with blood-red spots, the tank should terrify the enemy, instilling primal horror in him. Although experienced tankers know that there is no blood on the hull at all , but splashes of tomato juice. No wonder the paint is called Mary.

description.name: Storm
description.text: data/colormaps/bu/preview.png;Dye with protection against three guns. Good resistance to the Flamethrower and a small reduction in the damage of Freeze and Hammer. Can only be useful at close range. Has a masking natural texture and makes the tank more inconspicuous.

description.name: Carbon
description.text: data/colormaps/treiser/preview.png;A combination of high tech, carbon fiber and a highly durable paint. Carbon significantly reduces the damage dealt by medium-caliber weapons.

description.name: First Love
description.text: data/colormaps/love/preview.png;Designed for sophisticated and romantic natures, this coloring can not only quench the thirst for beauty of the aesthete tempted by military paraphernalia, but also help win a couple of seconds at a stunned enemy staring in fascination at the red heart enchantment at the center of the battlefield.

description.name: Alien
description.text: data/colormaps/chyzoy/preview.png;There is a legend that this camouflage copies the coloration of a flying saucer shot down by you-know-who-know-where air defenses in the last century.

description.name: Dirty
description.text: data/colormaps/g/preview.png;A nanofoam layer provides a high degree of protection for your tank from long-range weapons such as Rail and Shaft. And a special coloration makes your tank hard to see for their overheated optics.

description.name: Swash
description.text: data/colormaps/pe/preview.png;Surf's coating formula was stolen from a secret lab codenamed Aqua that specializes in genetic experiments on fish. sea ​​freshness to the air inside the tank.

description.name: Jaguar
description.text: data/colormaps/y/preview.png;Code-named Jaguar, this defense system has the mottled coloration of a noble predator.

description.name: Desert
description.text: data/colormaps/p/preview.png;A paint that will slightly reduce damage from Smokey, Hammer and Twins and reliably protect the tank from Ricochet balls. Useful at medium and long range. Has natural camouflage texture and makes the tank less noticeable.

description.name: Corrosion
description.text: data/colormaps/rj/preview.png;Antipathos, antiglamour, and a fashion statement! Blood Rust is the choice of tough tankers who despise gloss and shine. Produced by oxidizing metal shavings in baths of blood, this paint speaks of the brutality and hardness of the character of the tanker.

description.name: Tundra
description.text: data/colormaps/tundra/preview.png;One of the few truly stylish paints. The texture is harsh and masculinely simple. Makes the tank less visible on the battlefield.

description.name: Roger
description.text: data/colormaps/rodj/preview.png;A paint that effectively protects against Twins' attacks. Also gives a small amount of protection against the heat of the Flamethrower. Useful at close to medium range. Covers your tank in skulls and makes it stand out from the crowd.

description.name: Cedar
description.text: data/colormaps/k/preview.png;To create a masking coating Cedar a complex composition based on crushed pine cone flakes is used. Its indisputable advantage is 100% environmental friendliness of production and two bags of peeled pine nuts as a gift for every second can of paint.

description.name: Python
description.text: data/colormaps/pet/preview.png;Python skin is not a snakeskin stylization, but the whole skin of a real python. The skin of a real python is made using this ingenious technology: the Cambodian giant python is seared hungry, and then they slip him a tank smeared with pork fat. The snake swallows it whole, cuts off everything superfluous.

description.name: Electra
description.text: data/colormaps/el/preview.png;One of the most beautiful paints, developed with the participation of French model houses. Electra has good camouflage properties, aesthetic appearance, and also gives your tank decent defense against melee weapons.

description.name: Sandstone
description.text: data/colormaps/pes/preview.png;Sandstone finish combines the camouflage properties of sand paint with the durability of wind-hardened stone. The Sandstone gift set includes swim trunks or a bikini on choice, sunglasses and beach umbrella.

description.name: Spark
description.text: data/colormaps/i/preview.png;Fairy of light, cascade of lights, music of spheres - this unique coating can be described in many ways, but none of them fully reflects its depth. chosen by tankers, for whom a tank is not just a combat vehicle, but a means of self-expression.

description.name: Digital
description.text: data/colormaps/di/preview.png;It's not just paint, it's a real protective complex. It consists of highly resistant paint with enhanced camouflage properties and special nanobots. Coated with Digital The tank is well protected from Smokey and Rails.

description.name: Rustle
description.text: data/colormaps/hel/preview.png;Tanks are not afraid of either heat or frost, so battles rage all year round. This means that tankers need camouflage not only for different terrain, but also for all seasons.This color will help blend in with the fallen leaves and boletus in the autumn forest.Provided that you manage to drive a tank into the forest..

description.name: Hohloma
description.text: data/colormaps/h/preview.png;Initially, Khokhloma paint was created exclusively for export. It covered tanks sold abroad in order to emphasize the original Russian origin of military equipment. Now Khokhloma can be obtained on the domestic market, and in the design bureaus, according to rumors, a project of a matryoshka tank is already being created.

description.name: Loam
description.text: data/colormaps/gl/preview.png;The best way to take the enemy's eyes off your tank is to splatter it with mud. However, natural mud is quite unstable - it is easily washed away with water and even falls off in layers in hot weather. In order to give the tank the desired dirty color, the Clay coating was developed. It includes ceramic waste from the best Chinese pottery workshops.

description.name: Winter
description.text: data/colormaps/metel/preview.png;This paint is designed specifically for battles on snowy maps and in high visibility conditions.

description.name: Urban
description.text: data/colormaps/bran/preview.png;Best paint for urban combat.

description.name: Savanna
description.text: data/colormaps/savanna/preview.png;Perfect for hiding among thick foliage such as jungle environments. Careful though... gorillas are known to use leaves for `cleaning` purposes.

description.name: Irbis
description.text: data/colormaps/ir/preview.png;One of the most mysterious feline animals is the irbis, also known as the snow leopard. Researchers in many countries have been unsuccessfully trying to catch a live irbis for detailed study, but so far this Only our biological engineers succeeded. After a series of risky experiments and fifteen accidents, they introduced the Irbis paint. The coating contains the DNA of a snow leopard, which makes it absolutely unique and, to some extent, even environmentally friendly.

description.name: Emerald
description.text: data/colormaps/izu/preview.png;Style and Grill Paint Lab has been working for a long time on a coating that will retain the tank's classic green tones while at the same time emphasizing the high status of its owner. The result of many years of work was the paint Emerald, as if glowing from within. Emphasize your position!

description.name: Inferno
description.text: data/colormaps/in/preview.png;Inferno's coating is smuggled into the market from clandestine glassblowing workshops in China. According to the manufacturers themselves, its defiant appearance symbolizes strength, courage, good luck and longevity .Great paint for a furious attack!

description.name: Jade
description.text: data/colormaps/n/preview.png;A paint with one of the best Shaft defenses. Good damage reduction from Smokey, Thunder, and Hammer. Useful at any distance. Gives your tank the look of a mineral.

description.name: Taiga
description.text: data/colormaps/tai/preview.png;Taiga's camouflage coating camouflages the tank so well in dense vegetation that it can even hunt elk. The shy animal does not notice the threat and approaches close to the combat vehicle. However, another tanker may be in the place of the elk ...

description.name: Prodigi
description.text: data/colormaps/pro/preview.png;An improved version of the standard Digital is made using the secret technology Ripples in the Eyes. It not only reliably camouflages the tank, but also annoys the enemy, forcing him make more mistakes.

description.name: Rock
description.text: data/colormaps/sk/preview.png;A paint with perfect anti-Tweens. Good damage reduction from Hammer, Isis, and Freeze. Useful for close to mid-range. Makes your tank look like a rock .

description.name: Fluid
description.text: data/colormaps/fluid/preview.png;The fluid paint was invented by chemists by accident, which was done in a basic way. Chemistry fanatics usually use this paint against opponents on the battlefield.

description.name: Picasso
description.text: data/colormaps/pic/preview.png;Pablo Picasso's name for the renowned Cubist master Pablo Picasso is not in vain. Thin, polygonal armor pieces join together in an abstract pattern that dissipates even the most powerful lethal charge. The choice of true art critics!

description.name: Zeus
description.text: data/colormaps/zews/preview.png;Zeus Paint is named for its unusual texture. Bright flashes of lightning on your tank will reduce the damage of enemy cannons and make you look cool in any battle.

description.name: Clay
description.text: data/colormaps/tina/preview.png;The paint codenamed Tina was developed for sabotage tank brigades operating in swampy areas. Tanks were so well camouflaged that even leeches did not notice them and at full speed crashed into an armored hull. Now the coating is being tested in new conditions - in a waterless area.

description.name: Repair Kit
description.text: data/numerics/hea.png;Gradually restores health at a rate of 30 hp per second. Heals either until complete of healing, or until it has exhausted its resource, equal to the full health of the tank. Indispensable thing in the battle. A set of well-matched medicines, neatly packaged in a plastic box, allows you to heal minor wounds and superficial cuts. The included thread, needle, and bactericidal gel will help reattach fingers, ears, and other small body parts that were cut off in the battlefield. The box itself is not only for storing all this stuff, according to the military engineers idea it should also act as a biotoilet.

description.name: Double Armor
description.text: data/numerics/armo.png;Doubles the protection for 1 minute. A set of advanced ceramic-kevlar armor plates mounted in standard 600x800mm slots. Weighting only 10 kg, this plate can double the protective properties of standard armor, taking on 50% of the kinetic and thermal energy of an explosion when properly installed. The kit also includes scissors with pobedite blades, three spools of double-sided duct tape, and a white lacy non-woven cloth, which, judging by the instructions, you can`t do without.

description.name: Double Damage
description.text: data/numerics/damag.png;Doubles the performance of the gun for 1 minute. A unique military development - a small metal sleeve mounted on the middle part of the muzzle by means of two 20 bolts and one grub screw. It allows the exit velocity of a projectile of any nature to be doubled, thereby doubling its striking power. Unfortunately, the self-contained power source that powers the electromagnetic modulator, which accelerates the matter inside the barrel, quickly discharges and the device becomes unusable.

description.name: Speed Boost
description.text: data/numerics/n2.png;Increases speed for 1 minute. Nitrous oxide tank should be in every tank. Firstly, it is an excellent fuel for temporary acceleration of a fighting vehicle. Secondly, nitrous oxide, also known as laughing gas, can be used for anesthesia and just to cheer you up. If you meet a stupidly fast tanker, you know he just snorted N20.

description.name: Mine
description.text: data/numerics/min.png;The mine is deactivated if the owner is killed, quits the battle or the battle ends. In a team battle, mines do not react on allies. A mine is a friend, comrade and brother of an experienced tanker. Stealthily sneak behind enemy lines and mine his headquarters, cover his comrades in retreat, block the approaches to the base - all made possible by the use of an inconspicuous deadly device. A tank that`s blown up by a mine will lose 120 to 240 health (hp). The mine`s activation time is 2 seconds, and it can be used again only after 30 seconds.
